scripts.say: Prior to the Royal Navy's plan
Illustrious! Are you coming as well?
Greetings, Warspite. Yes, as per Her Majesty's orders, I will be accompanying you on this voyage.
I see. Well, as I was saying earlier, we are preparing a joint Royal Navy-Sardegna search party to find where the Sirens are coming from...
But you're wary about their motives for agreeing to your terms so readily?
You're quite perceptive, as always. Something seemed suspicious about the plan they proposed.
They claimed that they wanted to carry out this search operation at nighttime because the Sirens are supposedly more active then.
But, it just so happens that our patrol units at Malta don't operate at night. There's a possibility that they want to seize on that opportunity.
Yes, I made some preparations for that very scenario before I got here.
You... did what? In any case, we don't have any proof that the Sardegnians are actually plotting something...
Call it a woman's intuition, but I already consulted with Her Majesty about this.
A... woman's intuition?
Don't you know that this ability is sometimes more fearsome than the most brilliant tactical mind?
Listen, you...
I have prepared countermeasures and a follow-up plan in case the Sardegnians would do anything that's not in our best interest. Oh, I've also prepared...
... What are those? Flares?
Correct. But we need someone who can use them to signal us if something happens...
At that time, York happened to be passing by.
Yes, you're perfect!
Huh? Whaaaat?
